pr_title: Give examples of adding methods to interfaces as incompatible

timeline.message:
Give examples of adding methods to interfaces as incompatible

@suztomo since this is one of the cases we see most frequently

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              - Adding a method to an interface unless you can provide a default implementation
          
          
            
              - Adding a method to an interface without a default implementation
          
      
    
    
  

I don't think "can" is needed.
timeline.author: suztomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -37,6 +37,8 @@ that lays out a number of rules designed to align with common practice.
     when a dependency is bumped to a higher major version.
   - Changing a method signature
   - Removing a method (deprecated or not)
+  - Adding a method to an interface unless you can provide a default implementation
